attachments.fallback:
[November 22nd, 2019 11:35 AM] me1542: Observable <https://observablehq.com/collection/@observablehq/explorables> is having a meetup in SF <https://ti.to/observablehq/meetup/en> and I'd love to see future of coding folks there! Observable is

• almost-JS in a notebook interface that uses the DAG of your code to reevaluate spreadsheet-style
• runs using your browser's JS engine, not on a server
• leans into the visualization use case but is a very general platform
aka hopefully sufficiently non-revolutionary to catch on
attachments.text:
Observable <https://observablehq.com/collection/@observablehq/explorables> is having a meetup in SF <https://ti.to/observablehq/meetup/en> and I'd love to see future of coding folks there! Observable is

• almost-JS in a notebook interface that uses the DAG of your code to reevaluate spreadsheet-style
• runs using your browser's JS engine, not on a server
• leans into the visualization use case but is a very general platform
aka hopefully sufficiently non-revolutionary to catch on
